mapper.select: SELECT id, file_name, type, size, md5, url, deleted, status, create_time, update_time from files where id = #{id}} and deleted = 0
select id, file_name, type, size, md5, url, deleted, status, create_time, update_time from files where md5 = #{md5} and deleted = 0
select id, file_name, type, size, md5, url, deleted, status, create_time, update_time from files where file_name = #{fileName} and deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files(file_name, type, size, md5, url) VALUES(#{fileName}, #{type}, #{size}, #{md5}, #{url})
